title: About ABIT (Autonomous)
paragraphs: Ajay Binay Institute of Technology is a premier engineering institution dedicated to delivering excellence in engineering education. The university is committed to supporting India's development through rigorous academic programs, cutting-edge research initiatives, and fostering a culture of innovation and entrepreneurship.

Established as a leading engineering institution in Odisha, the university combines academic rigor with practical expertise. Our institution is recognized for maintaining high standards of education, fostering research initiatives, and cultivating an environment where students and faculty collaborate to advance technological innovation and scientific discovery.

In 2026, Ajay Binay Institute of Technology proudly celebrates 28 years of academic excellence and innovation. As we mark this significant milestone on 7th November, 2026, we reflect on our journey and renew our commitment to shaping future leaders in science, technology, and engineering.
